philosophy: Load only what you need. Speed is a feature.
objective: Reduce token count by 60% and response time by 50% through intelligent context loading.

PROFILE_STRATEGY.name: Market Strategy & Creative Ideation
PROFILE_STRATEGY.use_when: User asks about market trends, theme concepts, or creative features

PROFILE_ARCHITECTURE.name: System Architecture & Structure
PROFILE_ARCHITECTURE.use_when: User asks about file structure, dependencies, or OS 2.0 architecture

PROFILE_CODE_GENERATION.name: Code Production (Liquid/JS/CSS)
PROFILE_CODE_GENERATION.use_when: User asks to generate sections, snippets, or fix code

PROFILE_SECURITY_AUDIT.name: Security Scanning & Validation
PROFILE_SECURITY_AUDIT.use_when: User asks about XSS, CSRF, or security vulnerabilities

PROFILE_DOCUMENTATION.name: Documentation & Merchant Guides
PROFILE_DOCUMENTATION.use_when: User asks to explain features or generate merchant guides

PROFILE_DEBUGGING.name: Bug Fixing & Error Handling
PROFILE_DEBUGGING.use_when: User reports bugs, errors, or asks to fix broken code

PROFILE_FULL_CONTEXT.name: Complete System Access (Heavy)
PROFILE_FULL_CONTEXT.use_when: Complex multi-phase tasks OR explicit user request for 'full analysis'

routing_logic.step_3: Load ONLY files in that profile's 'load_files' array.
routing_logic.step_4: If task requires multiple profiles, load them sequentially (not simultaneously).
routing_logic.fallback: If no clear match, use PROFILE_CODE_GENERATION (safest default).

example_1.user_query: Analyze the perfume market and suggest a theme concept.

example_2.user_query: Generate a video-grid section with autoplay.

example_3.user_query: Check this code for XSS vulnerabilities.

override_command.action: User can force PROFILE_FULL_CONTEXT by typing ' @full-context' in their message.
override_command.use_case: When user knows they need deep multi-file analysis.
